name: RetrieveDiscountRecords
description:
Retrieve discount records by ID or custom property.

This tool retrieves discount records from HubSpot CRM by specifying record IDs or a unique custom property. Use it to fetch detailed information about discounts in a batch.

parameters.name: discount_request_body
parameters.description: JSON object containing properties, idProperty for custom IDs, inputs for record IDs, and propertiesWithHistory for detailed properties.

propertiesWithHistory.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object and their histories.

idProperty.description: When using a custom unique value property to retrieve records, the name of the property. Do not include this parameter if retrieving by record ID.

properties.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Set to true to return only archived results.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

propertiesWithHistory.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object and their histories.

idProperty.description: When using a custom unique value property to retrieve records, the name of the property. Do not include this parameter if retrieving by record ID.

properties.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
